actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

official_title: Supporting the designation, during spring 2005, of National Horticultural Therapy Week in order to improve the quality of life for all and increase opportunities for each individual to positively connect with the natural world.

summary.text:
Supports the designation, during spring 2005, of National Horticultural Therapy Week in order to improve the quality of life for all and increase opportunities for each individual to positively connect with the natural world.

Urges Federal and State governmental entities and the people of the United States to observe such Week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Supporting the designation, during spring 2005, of National Horticultural Therapy Week in order to improve the quality of life for all and increase opportunities for each individual to positively connect with the natural world.
